thread.title: California residents advised to evacuate ahead of potential mudslides

title: California residents advised to evacuate ahead of potential mudslides
text:
California residents advised to evacuate ahead of potential mudslides 9:02am EST - 00:51 
Just weeks after deadly mudslides devastated parts of Southern California, thousands have been advised to leave their homes ahead of a rainstorm that could again trigger dangerous conditions. Linda So reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Just weeks after deadly mudslides devastated parts of Southern California, thousands have been advised to leave their homes ahead of a rainstorm that could again trigger dangerous conditions. Linda So reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2HWvQJ6
